text:
e="preserve">Firestorm is the name of many fictional superheroes appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. Ronnie Raymond and Martin Stein were the first incarnation in "Firestorm, the Nuclear Man"  1 (March 1978) and were created by Gerry Conway and Al Milgrom.
Firestorm is featured in the CW's "Arrowverse", played by Robbie Amell, Victor Garber, and Franz Drameh.
